Tokyo Soundwalks
FOR FREE
TOKYO REALTIME audio guided tours revealing new sides to Tokyo’s most interesting neighborhoods. Due to Covid-19 restrictions on travel to Japan, we've made this project free thanks to the sponsorship of White Rabbit Express and Blackship. We hope you'll enjoy these imaginative experiences of Tokyo informative and entertaining.

Blog posts

All of these entries are posts in a collection

  • January 1, 2020

    Blog posts live in a collection

    Eleventy lets you gather items together into collections in a variety of ways. I regularly want to have a set of blog posts so ElevenTail is set up with a collection of posts held in a blog folder.

  • December 31, 2019

    Blog posts use a layout of their own

    All files in the blog folder get the same meta data for things like their template language, tags thy should share and the layout they should use.
